nodes.text: The son of Imperial Admiral Winstel Greelanx was a male individual who was an adult and married by around 4 BBY. Greelanx loved his son. Consequently, when he feared retribution in the event that his deliberate defeat at the Battle of Nar Shaddaa be uncovered, he dismissed the idea of fleeing to save himself because that course of action would likely result in his family's deaths.
